sections: We’re now 3+ months into doing TMI. We’ve been breaking big stories and making a big impact — but we really want YOUR feedback about our work. So here’s our ask:
Please click here and fill out this very short survey
about our current work and about some things we are planning.
Your answers will only go to us, they won’t be public. And please — be as brutally honest as you can. We won’t be offended — we need your honest opinions and thoughts.
If you want to publish some public feedback, please use the comments right here at the bottom of this post on the website.
Thanks in advance for doing this!
